message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper proposes a novel approach to hierarchical reinforcement learning, which is a popular topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The approach is based on the linearly solvable Markov decision process (LMDP) framework, which is a mathematical framework used in optimization and control problems (cs.RO). The paper also discusses the use of deep hierarchies, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed approach involves concurrent execution of many actions in parallel, which is related to the field of distributed systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper introduces a new module for maintaining a parallel distributed representation of tasks, which is a topic in multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
